title: fps drop when dancing or using hot keys
body: in game i always get 300+ fps with max everything. (not that i need the 300 fps).... besides the point.. i am losing a ton of fps when using    {ctrl 1-3}.    i can use laugh and not get fps drop. trying to dance gives me 20 fps and sometimes wont even do it along with the other moves.. any suggestions?

replies.body:
It sounds like some of those animation assets may be missing or corrupted, causing the game to have to live patch them in real-time and cause performance issues. I'd recommend [running a repair of your game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if anything changes.

Let me know the results.

i have the same issue and tried the repair and the issue still exists... i've even tried completely uninstalling the game, redownloading the installer and starting fresh.  the issue still exists.  any other suggestions?

I'd recommend capping your FPS in-game to 60 or 120, then working through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) if you still see those FPS drops.

Please let me know if those steps resolved this.

i've tried capping the fps, however i still stuttering for a few seconds after inputting the ctrl+12345 keys...  even repairing, and fresh install does not resolve the issue.  I'm thinking it may be something with my drivers/hardware.  any insight on what component i may focus on in resolving this issue?

It could be a few different things, but I feel at this point it's better to escalate this to our tech specialists so we can work on pinpointing exactly what's causing this. I'd like you to run a set of system logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before you attach those logs to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into any troubles with that.

i've actually been experiencing that for a few patches now.  not sure if it's league or pc issues.  but i only get it while dancing or doing any of the other ctrl+# animations.  i've got a decent enough build to handle the game. i7 cpu, 16gb ram, gtx980.. idk what gives.  i've also tried repairing the client, but i'll try again and report back.  let me know if you've had any luck.  thanks.
